Прочитайте мини-текст и найдите для него лучший заголовок. The Louvre in Paris is the world's largest and most visited art museum. It is home to thousands of works of art, from ancient civilizations to the mid-19th century, including the famous Mona Lisa. Its glass pyramid entrance has become a modern icon of the city.
options: a) A Landmark of Art and Culture
b) The History of European Painting
d) The Life of Leonardo da Vinci
questions.explanation: Заголовок отражает главную тему: музей как культурный и архитектурный символ.

questions.question: Прочитайте мини-текст и найдите для него лучший заголовок. A tornado is a violently rotating column of air that extends from a thunderstorm to the ground. The most extreme tornadoes can reach wind speeds of more than 300 miles per hour, causing incredible damage and uprooting trees. They are most common in the central United States.
options: b) The Science Behind Destructive Winds
c) A Guide to Storm Chasing
d) How to Build a Storm Shelter
questions.explanation: Заголовок точно описывает научное объяснение явления, данного в тексте.

questions.question: Прочитайте мини-текст и найдите для него лучший заголовок. Coca-Cola was invented in 1886 by pharmacist John Pemberton in Atlanta, USA. It was initially intended as a patent medicine. The unique taste of the syrup was mixed with carbonated water by accident, and the drink quickly became a popular soda fountain beverage.
options: a) The Rise of a Global Brand
b) The Invention of Carbonated Water
questions.explanation: Заголовок охватывает суть текста: случайное создание и последующий успех напитка.

questions.question: Прочитайте мини-текст и найдите для него лучший заголовок. When starting your first job, it's crucial to be punctual, dress appropriately, and show a willingness to learn. Don't be afraid to ask questions, as it shows you are engaged. Building good relationships with your colleagues is also key to a positive work environment.
options: a) How to Negotiate a Salary
b) Keys to a Successful Career Start
c) The History of Workplace Etiquette
d) Choosing the Right Career Path
questions.explanation: Заголовок обобщает все ключевые советы для успешного начала карьеры.

questions.question: You are writing a formal letter of complaint to a hotel manager. What is the correct way to introduce the main problem?

b) I'm really angry about the terrible service at your hotel.
c) Hey, your service was awful.
